div.h4: Only few boys age 7 to 10 are showing up in the amusement park. The boys say that the rides are too boring. Therefore you have organized a brainstorm with two of your colleagues. You should come up with ideas on how to get more boys to come to the park.
div.h6:
Write your ideas in the field at the bottom. Press 'Enter' each time you have written an idea.
While you write, you can see Laura and Achmed's ideas on the screen. Click on the text in the large field, when you are ready to brainstorm. Go on to the next task, when you don't have more ideas. You have max three minutes for the brainstorm.
